extensionAttribute.description: Displays the URL to a monitored computer's record in Watchman Monitoring.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/bash if [[ -f /Library/MonitoringClient/Utilities/ExportStatus ]]; then echo "<result>$(defaults read /Library/MonitoringClient/ClientData/UnifiedStatus.plist ClientURL)</result>" else echo "<result>Watchman Monitoring not installed</result>" fi
